Magic

Spells:
Arcane Lock (W2 Abju): Touched barrier becomes passable only by designated creatures
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP necrotic, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Disguise Self (W1 Illu): Self clothing and body appear different for 1 hr
Glyph Of Warding (W3 Abju): 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder (Dex half) or spell up to level 3 when triggered [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP or triggers +1 spell level]
Light (W0 Evoc): Touched object lights 20' radius (Dex neg) for 1 hr
Message (W0 Tran): R120' Self and target have whispered conversation for 1 rd
Prestidigitation (W0 Tran): R10' Self performs minor magic effects for 1 hr
Ray Of Sickness (W1 Necr): R60' Target suffers 2d8 HP poison and poisoned 1 rd (Con not poisoned) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Shatter (W2 Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 3d8 HP thunder (Con half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Thunderwave (W1 Evoc): 15' cu inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (Con half, no push) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Tongues (W3 Divi): Touched understands and speaks any language for 1 hr
Unseen Servant (W1 Conj): R60' Invisible force performs simple tasks for 1 hr
Web (W2 Conj): R60' 20' cu restrains creatures (Dex neg, Str frees) for conc or 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Arcane Recovery: Taking a short rest restores 3 spell slot levels 1/dy
Divination Savant: Copy divination spells into spellbook for half cost
Elemental Adept (Acid): Acid spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Cold): Cold spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Fire): Fire spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Lightning): Lightning spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Thunder spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Portent: Replace target attack, ability, or saving throw 2/long rest
Ritual Caster: Cast spells from ritual book
Ritual Casting: May cast a known spell using a ritual
Spell Sniper: Dbl attack spell range, ignore 3/4 cover, know additional attack cantrip
War Caster: Adv on concentration to maintain spell, cast when holding shield and/or weapon, use Reaction to cast as OA
